snippet: With so many holiday parties, men are trying to figure out how to look festive when going directly from work.
abstract: Well-tailored and colorful suits are a great fashion option for men trying to figure out how to dress festively for holiday parties that start directly after work.
lead_paragraph: With so many holiday parties, men are trying to figure out how to look festive when going directly from work.

headline.seo: For Men, a Holiday Look That Goes Directly From the Office
headline.main: Suits in Search of Holiday Cheer
headline.print_headline: Suits in Search Of Holiday Cheer
